alert.note: Alert for Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 17 at 10:53AM MST until December 17 at 1:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON BELOW 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Visibility below 1/2 mile in dense fog below 5000 feet. * WHERE...In Colorado, Four Corners/Upper Dolores River. In Utah, Southeast Utah. * WHEN...Until 1 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Major routes impacted include portions of Hwy 160 and Hwy 41 in extreme southwest Colorado as well as Hwy 162, Hwy 163 and portions of Hwy 191 in southeast Utah.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
